alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 11:20AM EDT until May 29 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Alabama... Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From this evening to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 17 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:05 AM CDT Friday the stage was 16.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 17.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 17 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
